contributors: Mission Group of Peace for All.
item.title: Kitāb-i mazāmīr-i Ḥaz̤rat-i Dāvīd = Sefer Tehilim : tefilah le-Daṿid.
notes: Produced in Tehran, Iran; edited by ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Mʻaṣūmī Tihrānī; illumination by Mahdī Bahman.

Hand-lettered Persian text with interlinear Hebrew original, hand-colored and gilded title pages, chapter headings, and decorations; text framed by gilded line with thin black edging approximately 1 mm from the gold; uniformly light cream color paper throughout; no visible watermarks.
Persian text in clear Nastaʻlīq; Hebrew in modern square charaters with rubricated vocalization; 12 lines in written area, 23 x 15.
Signature and seal of editor and signature of calligrapher at end of colophon.
Binding is unadorned, contemporary brown leather.
summary: Text of Sefer Tehillim [Book of Psalms] in Hebrew with interlinear Persian translation.
subjects: Library of Congress.--African and Middle Eastern Division.--Hebraic Section
Illumination of books and manuscripts, Iranian
